data: I was born, as near as I can calculate, in the year 1801, at the time of the Equinoctial gales, a fact which made the old fisherwives present at my birth declare that I was marked out by the finger of Providence for a sailor.
Richard Galbraith, Mariner; Or, Life among the Kaffirs
